title: Samourai Wallet Helps Produce Documentary on Cody Wilson’s 3D Firearm Legacy
description: A new documentary delving into 3D firearm printing and Defense Distributed’s Cody Wilson is set to release. Directed by Jessica Solce and produced by Encode Productions and the Samourai Wallet team, the film will digitally debut on October 21, 2023. ‘Death Athletic’ Features Cody Wilson and the Rise of 3D-Printed Guns “Death Athletic: A Dissident […]

title: US House Speaker drama challenges crypto prospects for 2023
description: The future of crypto legislation has been put to the test as its trajectory is threatened by the US House Speaker drama. Majority leader Steve Scalise stepped down, and this left the Republic Party in jeopardy, bringing doubts on prospects of digital asset legislation advancement.  Trying to resolve this, Rep. title: Stride hits the brakes on STRD to ATOM conversion
description: In the vibrant and often tumultuous world of blockchain, Stride, an esteemed entity in the Cosmos ecosystem, has strategically paused its plan to transfigure its native token, STRD, into the Cosmos Hub’s ATOM token. This decision was remarkably taken a mere nine days after the initial proposition by Stride Labs’ co-founder, Vishal Talasani. The unfolding ... Read more

title: Hoskinson on ETHGate: XRP Never Threatens ETH, It Has No Smart Contracts
description:
The ETHGate scandal, which borders on the allegation of the member of the Ethereum community supposedly bribing officials of the U.S. regulator, is never subsiding as Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson fervently counters the claims from the XRP enthusiasts. In a recent tweet, Hoskinson reaffirmed his stance on the matter, emphasizing that Ripple (XRP) was not […]

The post Hoskinson on ETHGate: XRP Never Threatens ETH, It Has No Smart Contracts appeared first on Coin Edition.
